item.title: Vance says 'America First' movement rejects 'purity tests,' welcomes critical thinkers
item.description: JD Vance tells AmericaFest that president Trump built the greatest coalition by rejecting purity tests and welcoming freethinkers to America First.

item.title: White House teases major housing affordability plan as prices squeeze Americans
item.description: Kevin Hassett says President Donald Trump will review housing policy ideas at Mar-a-Lago after Christmas, promising relief for struggling homebuyers.

item.title: Rapper Nicki Minaj teams up with new Turning Point USA leader Erika Kirk for Q&A session
item.description: Rapper Nicki Minaj shifts political support toward President Donald Trump after speaking about Christian persecution in Nigeria, and teams up with Tur...

item.title: Former Brown University student and friend to Ella Cook blames 'spending priorities' for lack of security
item.description: Brown University allegedly failed to prevent a campus murder due to outdated security systems, says former student who exposed administrative waste.

item.title: AmericaFest honors Target employee Jeanie Beeman after viral video shows calm response to harassment
item.description: Target employee Jeanie Beeman was honored at AmericaFest after going viral for calmly handling a confrontation over her Charlie Kirk T-shirt at work.
